48e8f8ec-58dd-4fdc-bc8e-873a8bd1345c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"48e8f8ec-58dd-4fdc-bc8e-873a8bd1345c","title":{"en":"Another World Dump Truck"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"이세계 덤프트럭"},{"es-la":"Un camión me mandó a otro mundo"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["es-la","en","pl"],"description":{"en":"Yul, the manager of the interdimensional dump truck office, accidentally kills an innocent man named Kwon Yoo-jun. O belo protagonista masculino Luo Yang é considerado um homem feio e se tornou um barqueiro no prédio da putaria, mas secretamente ele é um super paparazzi que tem muitas informações e como o único homem no mundo do cultivo que pode cultivar, seu cultivo atingiu o nível de imperador. Desde então, a seita que foi originalmente misturada com peixes e dragões virou de cabeça para baixo por causa da chegada do protagonista masculino… Hmph… O que eu quero cultivar é a futura Imperatriz."},"links":{"mu":"5lrmyw5","raw":"https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/653478"},"originalLanguage":"zh","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

49d64db2-5841-4ccc-aee8-7b3a0970f6df:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"49d64db2-5841-4ccc-aee8-7b3a0970f6df","title":{"en":"I'm Being Raised by Villains"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"악당들에게 키워지는 중입니다"},{"ko-ro":"Akdangdeurege Kiwojineun Jungimnida"},{"en":"Raised by Villains"},{"ja":"悪党たちに育てられてます！"},{"zh":"被恶棍们抚养中"},{"pt-br":"Eu estou sendo criada por vilões"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["es-la","pl","en","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!\n\nA year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.\n\nI said I’d rather leave the house on my own.\n\n“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”\n\nDid I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?\n\n‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’\n\nI got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.\n\n“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”\n\nHowever, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.\n\n=\n\nAfter returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.\n\n“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. 4a631208-7be4-4a93-807d-8ce49b52342d:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"4a631208-7be4-4a93-807d-8ce49b52342d","title":{"en":"The Solitary Gourmet"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"孤独のグルメ"},{"zh":"孤独的美食家"},{"ja-ro":"Kodoku no Gourmet"},{"ko-ro":"Kodoku no Gurume"},{"fr":"Le Gourmet Solitaire"},{"de":"Der Gourmet – Von der Kunst allein zu genießen"},{"it":"Gourmet"},{"es":"El Gourmet Solitario"}],"lastChapter":"31","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIds":["216fc9cb-10ac-4f2b-a185-60fa922fc2e1","230020d5-c718-45c6-94e3-3ececbf573b8","9062e8ad-5521-43ea-958c-de3eac2a9dd3","9c94a225-20ee-426d-a2f0-aa90013d035c","9f1437b9-0dfb-46e3-a728-45583f55c111"],"description":{"en":"This manga simply describes how Gorou Inogashira, the main character, chooses and takes a meal. Unlike other gourmet manga, Gorou likes to eat at cheap restaurants and no trivia on cuisine is given. The authors are trying to depict the essentials of the act of \"eating\" by Gorou's monologue, which comprises most of the lines of this manga.","ja":"個人で輸入雑貨商を営む主人公・井之頭五郎が一人で食事をするシチュエーションを淡々と描くハードボイルド・グルメマンガ。井之頭五郎は、食べる。それも、よくある街角の定食屋やラーメン屋で、ひたすら食べる。時間や社会にとらわれず、幸福に空腹を満たすとき、彼はつかの間自分勝手になり、「自由」になる。孤独のグルメ―。それは、誰にも邪魔されず、気を使わずものを食べるという孤高の行為だ。そして、この行為こそが現代人に平等に与えられた、最高の「癒し」といえるのである。"},"links":{"al":"34615","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B008ODF84I","ap":"kodoku-no-gourmet","bw":"series/115236/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/26897/","engtl":"http://www.ponentmon.com/comic-books-english/in-the-making/gourmet/index.html","kt":"9938","mal":"4615","mu":"69254"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ea2bc92d-1c26-4930-9b7c-d5c0dc1b6869","name":{"en":"Cooking"}}]}

4a663c00-b68e-46b7-8afe-4b05d41236d8:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"4a663c00-b68e-46b7-8afe-4b05d41236d8","title":{"en":"King Robo"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"キングロボ"}],"lastChapter":"10","description":{"en":"A super robot that surpasses Eight-Man!\n1963, the year when Japan's first TV anime series was born. At a time when children all over Japan were excited about the exploits of Astro Boy and Tetsujin 28-go, Jiro Kuwata, the creator of 8 Man created another super robot. That was ``King Robo,'' which was serialized in Shonen King.\n\nWhile 8 Man runs on the ground at super speed, King Robo flies freely through the air with the rockets on his back and belt. What's revolutionary is his arms, which can separate from his body and transform into a micro-jet plane depending on the situation, and his legs, which can be used as special drills to pierce even hard rocks. Although it is life-sized, it can be said to be a precursor to later shrunken down combined robots.\n\nA clear difference from 8 Man is that he does not have an electronic brain of his own, but rather operates by being possessed by a gaseous alien. In modern terms, it is a mobile suit worn by Alien King in order to fight. For this reason, Alien King uses two types of robots: a combat type (King Robo) and a humanoid robot.\n\nIt is unusual for Kuwata's works to not have an original author attached, but that allows you to truly enjoy the charm of Kuwata's world. This book includes the complete manuscript published at that time! This is a book that is definitely recommended."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B075TGM567?binding=kindle_edition\u0026ref=dbs_dp_rwt_sb_pc_tukn","bw":"series/24061/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/728709/","mu":"e191dea"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"50880a9d-5440-4732-9afb-8f457127e836","name":{"en":"Mecha"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}}]}

خلافة العرش. هكذا يبدأ عهد الإمبراطورات والنضال اللامتناهي ضد الرجال الذين يحاولون السيطرة على المملكة. بعد مقتل جميع شقيقاتها على يد يوم ، تجلس الإمبراطورة الشابة على العرش. بدلاً من أداء واجباتها كحاكم للمملكة ، تقضي الإمبراطورة أيامها ولياليها في الشرب والنوم مع رجال مختلفين ، تقوم بتنفيذهم جميعًا بعد ذلك مباشرة. يسميها الناس إمبراطورة الدم ، ويعزى ذلك إلى سلوكها العنيف وشعرها الأحمر المصبوغ بدماء الرجال الذين قتلتهم. ذات يوم ، تلتقي الإمبراطورة بشاب وسيم ومفكر يدعى Kanghee. وهي تمسك سيفها لتقتله ، تقنعها Kanghee بأن تنقذه وتبدأ في لفت انتباه قلبها بإخبارها قصصها التي قرأها من الكتاب. Ihre Schwester wurde vom Großfürsten Yeom beseitigt und aus Angst davor, daß der Vater ihrer Kinder dem Großfüsten gleichtun würde, führt sie ein wildes Leben und tötet alle Männer, die eine Nacht mit ihr verbringen. So began the reign of empresses and their endless struggle against men who try to control the kingdom. \n\nAfter all her sisters were killed at the hands of Yom, the young Empress was seated on the throne. Rather than performing her duties as a ruler of a kingdom, the empress spends her days and nights drinking and sleeping with different men, whom she all executes immediately after. The people call her the Blood Empress, attributed to her violent behavior and the red hair, which is dyed with the blood of the men she killed. \n\nOne day, the Empress meets a handsome and intellectual young man named Kanghee. As she picks up her sword to kill him, Kanghee convinces her to spare him and begins to captivate her heart by telling her stories he's read from a book. \n\nAs the empress gets closer and closer to Kanghee, she begins to change her violent ways. Is he someone she can finally put her trust in? sucederem ao trono. Assim começa o reinado das imperatrizes e a luta sem fim contra os homens que tentam controlar o reino. Depois que todas as suas irmãs são mortas pelas mãos de Yom, a jovem Imperatriz está sentada no trono. Em vez de cumprir seus deveres como governante de um reino, a imperatriz passa seus dias e noites bebendo e dormindo com homens diferentes, a quem ela uta imediatamente. As pessoas a chamam de Imperatriz vermelha, devido ao seu comportamento violento e ao cabelo ruivo tingido com o sangue dos homens que matou. Um dia, a Imperatriz conhece um jovem bonito e intelectual chamado Kanghee. Enquanto ela pega sua espada para matá-lo, Kanghee a convence a poupá-lo e começa a cativar seu coração, contando histórias que leu em um livro. Conforme a imperatriz fica cada vez mais perto de Kanghee, ela começa a mudar seus modos violentos. Ele é alguém em quem ela finalmente pode confiar? Ou não é?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/277), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8223093)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/277/?languageCode=en)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9836/)\n* [French / Français](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/277/?languageCode=fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/277/?languageCode=de)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.comico.jp/comic/277)\n* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://www.comico.vn/title/nghin-le-mot-dem-cua-nu-hoang/572)","ru":"Когда император убивает бога воды Питона, на королевство Ча накладывают проклятье, не дающее мужчинам занимать трон. Тем самым началось царствование императриц и бесконечная борьба мужчин, которые пытались взять под контроль королевство. После того, как Йом убила своих сестёр, молодая императрица заняла престол. Вместо того, чтобы исполнять свои должности, она днями и ночами пила и спала с разными мужчинами, после сразу же убивая их. Люди называют её «Кровавой Императрицей» Прозвище связано с её жестоким поведением и алыми волосами, которые она покрасила кровью мужчин, что она убила. Однажды, императрица встречает красивого и умного молодого человека по имени Канхи. Когда она поднимает меч, чтобы убить его, Канхи убеждает пощадить его и очаровывает её сердце, рассказывая истории, прочитанные из книги. Сближаясь с Канхи, императрица начинает менять её жестокие методы. Он тот, кому она наконец-то доверится? Ihre Eltern sehen dies als Chance, ihre Tochter an das Herzogtum Euklid zu verheiraten und zwingen sie dazu, Gift einzunehmen, von dem Urania stumm und blind wird. Diesen durch das Gift induzierten Gesundheitszustand nutzen die Eltern Uranias und behaupten, dass sich ihre Tochter bei der Rettung der Herzogswitwe verletzt hätte. Es kommt letztendlich zur Hochzeit zwischen Urania und dem Sohn der Herzogswitwe, Cassius. Doch als Uranias Eltern ihr befehlen, das Artefakt zu zerstören, mit dem das Kaiserreich eine Barriere gegen Zauberwesen aufgestellt hat, und sie diesem Befehl Folge leistet, wird sie verstoßen und stirbt an den Nebenwirkungen des Gifts. Wie durch ein Wunder wird sie zum Zeitpunkt vier Monate vor ihrem Tod wiedergeboren und sehnt sich nach einem friedlichen, gesunden und glücklichen Leben. Doch dafür muss sie sich erst von ihrem kalten und tyrannischen Ehemann Caussius trennen…\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0-%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EC%96%B4%EC%A9%90%EC%A7%80-%EC%A1%B0%EC%8B%A0%ED%95%B4%EC%A1%8C%EB%8B%A4/3088), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60261871)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000651)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000284)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/I-Accidentally-Tamed-the-Duke/745)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/129188)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%86_%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2/595)","en":"Eurenia, the eldest daughter of Count Vincent, famously lost her eyesight and voice when she saved the madam of the Euclid dukal family from a fire.\n\nThe truth, however, is that while she did save the duchess, her loss of sight and inability to speak are due to a drug she was forced to take in order to blackmail the Euclids into marrying her to their oldest son Cassius, the future Duke of Euclid. Treated as a pawn and puppet by her family, she was used and then discarded only to die from the sideeffects of the drug.\n\nShe thought that was the end, but no: When she opened her eyes again, she had returned to four months earlier, before she had betrayed her husband by order of her family. This was her chance to divorce Cassius, who was forced to marry her, then find a cure for the sideeffects of the drug that had robbed her of her sight and voice but…\n\n\"Is the reason you've been avoiding me all this time just because you're afraid of being discovered?\"\n\nHis purple eyes almost pierced her body, \"It isn't because you hate me?\"\n\nSuddenly his eyes turned red, \"May I come near you now?\"\n\nThen his ears also turned red...\n\n---\nCaught up in her parents' political scheme, Yurania is forced to lose her sight and voice in order to marry Duke Casius Euclid and betray him. After being imprisoned for her treachery and despised by all, she makes one dying wish to turn back time and freely live her own life. When Yurania miraculously awakens mere days before the betrayal, she seizes the opportunity to right everything...only to discover that her past relationships and all that she had known weren't what they seemed.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0-%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EC%96%B4%EC%A9%90%EC%A7%80-%EC%A1%B0%EC%8B%A0%ED%95%B4%EC%A1%8C%EB%8B%A4/3088), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60261871)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000651)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000284)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/I-Accidentally-Tamed-the-Duke/745)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/129188)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%86_%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2/595)","fr":"Grâce aux intrigues de sa famille, elle finit mariée au duc le plus riche du royaume. Mais à quel prix? Car si ses proches n’ont pas hésité à orchestrer un crime pour la transformer en héroïne et l’ont poussée à s’empoisonner pour attirer la pitié du duc, ils ne comptent pas s’arrêter là. Malheureusement, une de leurs manigances la fait finir en prison où elle meurt du poison qui lui avait déjà pris sa voix et la vue. Lorsqu’elle rouvre les yeux, elle est de retour dans le passé, peu de temps après son mariage! Cette fois-ci, personne ne se servira d’elle!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0-%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EC%96%B4%EC%A9%90%EC%A7%80-%EC%A1%B0%EC%8B%A0%ED%95%B4%EC%A1%8C%EB%8B%A4/3088), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60261871)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000651)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000284)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/I-Accidentally-Tamed-the-Duke/745)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/129188)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%86_%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2/595)","id":"Orang-orang tahu bahwa aku, Yurania, anak perempuan pertama dari Count Vincent kehilangan penglihatan dan suaraku saat menyelamatkan Nyonya Besar Euclid dari kebakaran.
